chemicals.gemini: LSD doesn't just activate serotonin receptors—it gets physically trapped inside them due to a unique 'lid' formation in the receptor protein. This molecular lock-in is why LSD's effects last 8-12 hours despite having a blood half-life of only 3-4 hours.
